resources.string: Thanks for helping us keep our listings up-to-date. Please use the form below to report any mistake to our listings manager. We will verify all submisssions and update our listings within 2-3 working days
We have just send a confirmation email to
. Please press the verification link to open your account.
You must first load the database,go to "more" and "load update"

This app stores all venue listings directly on your phone so you can access them without an internet connection. Listings update automatically every week when you connect to WiFi. Click below get the latest listings updates.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Shanghai\'s best venue directory with over 11,000 listings on your phone, available without an intenet connection.
The SmSh app downloads all directory information to your phone when you connect to WiFi, so it\'s always there when you need it.
Get SmartShanghai\'s unique and independent editorial coverage of cultural and social happenings around the city.
All our editorial content is original. We don\'t accept payment for content. Banner ads are labeled as such.
Curated and compiled by our editors, find out the latest event recommendations, art listings, dining promotions, and nightlife parties.
When you\'re out and about, search for nearby restaurants, bars, cafes, and places to go next based off your location.
Please allow this app to access your location to make use of this feature.
Find a bug? Got a feature you\'d like to see? Share your SmSh app experience with us by leaving a comment in the form below. We\'d love to hear your suggestions and feedback.
A newer, better version of this app is available. Please visit your App store to update it to the latest version.
